category.name: Teamcenter Microservices
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_Microservices_Base_URL
preference.preference_description: This preference defines how Teamcenter can connect to the docker stack deployed to the Teamcenter Service environment. Assuming Service Dispatcher is deployed at "tcServices.company.com" on port 9090 then specify http://tcServices.company.com:9090. Use https (e.g. https://tcServices.company.com:9090) if Service Dispatcher supports https communication. There should be no slash at the end of URL string.
